movies.original_title: Dear Stranger／ディア・ストレンジャー
movies.overview: A Japanese man and his Chinese-American wife struggle with work, parenting, and caregiving in NYC. Their strained life spirals when their son is kidnapped, leading to murder. Unspoken truths and secrets surface, deepening their rift. Can they rebuild their shattered vision of a "happy family"?
movies.title: Dear Stranger

movies.overview: A former special forces operative struggling to contain the destructive impulses of his past goes on a rampage against a squad of ruthless assassins.
movies.title: RE:BORN

movies.original_title: 人妻スチュワーデス 制服昇天
movies.overview: Today is last working day stewardess, she recalls life these days days ago…And, it is the first of a memorable day in life.
movies.title: Married Stewardess: Uniform Ascension

movies.original_title: るろうに剣心 最終章 The Beginning
movies.overview: Before he was a protector, Kenshin was a fearsome assassin known as Battosai. But when he meets gentle Tomoe Yukishiro, a beautiful young woman who carries a huge burden in her heart, his life will change forever.
movies.title: Rurouni Kenshin: The Beginning

movies.overview: Kako, a 16-year-old high school girl, goes to a mixer pretending to be 22. While there, she meets Kouta who at first has a very intimidating aura. But once he saves her from an awkward situation, she wants to know more about him as does he. That is until he finds out she isn't 22. The next day Kako runs into him again, but this time he's working as a police officer. Kako still wants to get closer to Kouta, but he isn't interested or is he?
movies.title: Policeman and Me

movies.original_title: るろうに剣心 最終章 The Final
movies.overview: In 1879, Kenshin and his allies face their strongest enemy yet: his former brother-in-law Enishi Yukishiro and his minions, who've vowed their revenge.
movies.title: Rurouni Kenshin: The Final

movies.original_title: ケイゾク／映画 Beautiful Dreamer
movies.overview: Graduating at the top of her class, elite detective candidate Jun Shibata is transferred to the section that handles cases deemed "unsolvable" by the department. Her partner, though a well-respected and experienced detective, has grown complacent after unsuccesfully pursuing these cases that many consider an exercise in futility. With her upper class breeding, her colleagues don't expect much from her either, but she suprises them all with her motivation and astounding powers of deduction. Well-constructed mysteries and colorful characters abound in this stylish and edgy police drama.
movies.title: Keizoku: Unsolved Mysteries - Beautiful Dreamer

movies.overview: Yukio is your average high school student who spends his days going to class and avoiding bullies. That is until he meets Ryusuke, a guitar prodigy. Together with Taira, Chiba, and Saku they form the rock band BECK. As their popularity increases so does the danger as Ryusuke's past catches up with him.
movies.title: BECK

movies.original_title: 仮面ライダーW（ダブル）RETURNS 仮面ライダーエターナル
movies.overview: Set primarily before the events of Kamen Rider W Forever, Kamen Rider Eternal tells the story of Daido Katsumi, the formation of NEVER, the mission that led them to target Fuuto, and reveals just how Daido obtained his Lost Driver and got his first taste of the power of Kamen Rider Eternal. As a mysterious woman retells this story to Phillip and Shotaro, they realize that Daido may not have been the simple monster he first appeared to be…
movies.title: Kamen Rider W Returns: Kamen Rider Eternal

movies.overview: Corry, a French coordinator of pediatric heart transplants is sent to Japan where organ donation remains taboo. As she fights to save a young boy, her partner Jin, a photographer from Yakushima, suddenly vanishes.
movies.title: Yakushima's Illusion

movies.overview: Hirayama is content with his life as a toilet cleaner in Tokyo. Outside of his structured routine, he cherishes music on cassette tapes, books, and taking photos of trees. Through unexpected encounters, he reflects on finding beauty in the world.
movies.tagline: In a world of fleeting moments, find the beauty that lasts.
movies.title: Perfect Days

movies.overview: Set in war-torn 15th century Kyoto, on the eve of the Onin War, the movie centers on a band of outlaws led by Hyoe, a scoundrel whose lethal sword skills place him at the tip of the spear in a deadly uprising against the corrupt Shogunate and its army, led by former friend-turned-archrival Doken.
movies.title: Samurai Fury

movies.overview: In postwar Japan, Godzilla brings new devastation to an already scorched landscape. With no military intervention or government help in sight, the survivors must join together in the face of despair and fight back against an unrelenting horror.
movies.tagline: Survive and fight. Live and resist.
movies.title: Godzilla Minus One

movies.original_title: くノ一忍法帖 自来也秘抄
movies.overview: This time the girls are the bad guys. Which means they will be a lot nude and action in this series and they have to fight a superhero called Jirasyso.
movies.title: Female Ninjas Magic Chronicles 5: Secret Story of Jiraiya

movies.overview: In post-apocalyptic Yokohama, a hard-boiled cop and a mellowed out drifter hook up with a gang of rebels. When the gang kidnap the cop's son, the wheels are set in motion for an inevitable showdown.
movies.title: Dead or Alive: Final

movies.original_title: 仮面ライダーW（ダブル）RETURNS 仮面ライダーアクセル
movies.overview: While settling into married life with Akiko, Ryu is brought into a case  involving a woman named Katsuragi Aoi, a member of a pickpocketing ring with most of her teammates murdered from unknown masked vigilantes that Ryu fought as Accel. As the details of the case begin to unravel, Ryu is framed and Akiko believes that he may not be faithful to her. As the clock ticks down, Ryu must solve the case, clear his name, and save his marriage before everything comes to an explosive end!
movies.title: Kamen Rider W Returns: Kamen Rider Accel

movies.original_title: 美弥 るりか　ディナーショー 『Razzle』
movies.overview: Dinner show.
movies.title: Miya Rurika Dinner Show 『Razzle』

movies.overview: A passionate telling of the story of Sada Abe, a woman whose affair with her master led to an obsessive and ultimately destructive sexual relationship.
movies.tagline: Never before had a man and a woman loved each other so intensely.
movies.title: In the Realm of the Senses

movies.original_title: 復讐 THE REVENGE 消えない傷痕
movies.overview: Second half of the violent tale of revenge from actor Sho Aikawa and director Kiyoshi Kurosawa! It's been five years since he left the force, lost his wife, and waged all out revenge, and now our hero is idling his time with a failing yakuza group. When he discovers the secret of one of his superiors, he takes up the gun of vengeance and realizes that his life has only been to serve that purpose.
movies.title: The Revenge: A Scar That Never Disappears

movies.overview: Murakawa, an aging Tokyo yakuza tiring of gangster life, is sent by his boss to Okinawa along with a few of his henchmen to help end a gang war, supposedly as mediators between two warring clans. He finds that the dispute between the clans is insignificant and whilst wondering why he was sent to Okinawa at all, his group is attacked in an ambush. The survivors flee and make a decision to lay low at the beach while they await further instructions.
movies.title: Sonatine

movies.overview: Misaki Amemiya is an assistant inspector for the Metropolitan Police Department's Community Safety Bureau who becomes ensnared in a trap while investigating a mysterious illegal video website called "Babylon". Soon, she's bound and tortured along with Shizuko and an oversexed housewife named Ruri.
movies.title: Flower & Snake: Zero

movies.overview: A pair of Tokyo policewomen who pack their own brand of "deadly weapons" do some serious undercover work as they take on the toughest cases the department has to offer in this steamy mix of cop action and softcore drama.
movies.title: Police Branch 82: Rebirth

movies.original_title: 続・レスビアンの世界　愛撫
movies.overview: Naomi, who runs a boutique, is a lesbian and has been having homosexual relationships with her staff, Reiko, and a married woman, Miyako. Her friend Mari, a singer, is also a lesbian, and this is a complicated love story between two women that begins when Reiko falls in love with her one-sidedly.
movies.title: Lesbian World: Fondling

movies.overview: Two contract killers cross paths in the middle of the same job and realize they are childhood friends. Together they take a break from killing and visit the small island they once called home. After reflecting on their past lives they decided to team up and use their talents in killing for good... much to the upset of the crime syndicates.
movies.title: Dead or Alive 2: Birds

movies.overview: Japan, 1944. Trained for intelligence work, Hiroo Onoda, 22 years old, discovers a philosophy contrary to the official line: no suicide; stay alive whatever happens; the mission is more important than anything else. Sent to Lubang, a small island in the Philippines where the Americans are about to land, this role will be to wage a guerrilla war until the return of the Japanese troops. The Empire will surrender soon after; Onoda, 10,000 days later.
movies.title: Onoda: 10,000 Nights in the Jungle

movies.original_title: NJPW The New Beginning In Sapporo 2023 - Day 2
movies.overview: The New Beginning in Sapporo 2023 - Night 2 was a professional wrestling event promoted by New Japan Pro Wrestling (NJPW). The event took place at the Hokkaido Prefectural Sports Center in Sapporo, Hokkaido, Japan, on February 5, 2023.
movies.title: NJPW The New Beginning In Sapporo 2023 - Day 2

movies.original_title: くノ一忍法帖III 秘戯伝説の怪
movies.overview: The government is worried that the Emperor will have no children because he can’t get an erection. The female ninjas try to find a sacred book that will help him, but they face a stiff challenge.
movies.title: Female Ninjas Magic Chronicles 3: Sacred Book of Sexual Positions

movies.original_title: 復讐 THE REVENGE 運命の訪問者
movies.overview: Sho Aikawa plays a police detective whose dark personal history makes it impossible for him to stay within the limits of the legal system. But he is not just a detective; he is also a husband who has to explain to his wife how he got blood on his sleeve. And the criminals he pursues turn out to be as imperfect and oddly human as he is-and just as determined to protect their own families.
movies.title: The Revenge: A Visit from Fate

movies.overview: Five bizarre stories with no apparent connection to one another eventually become intertwined, resulting in surreal circumstances.
movies.tagline: What is your function in life?
movies.title: Survive Style 5+

movies.original_title: レイプゾンビ LUST OF THE DEAD
movies.overview: After a nuclear attack in Tokyo, the female population is attacked by infected males who have become sex-crazed zombies, hungry for human flesh. Officeworker Momoko and nurse Nozomi seek shelter in a Shinto Shrine, where they meet housewife Kanae and school girl Tamae. With no choices left to them, the group of girls decides to take a stand and arm themselves with assault rifles and explosives to fight off hordes of horny zombies. What is the secret to killing the zombies for good?
movies.title: Rape Zombie: Lust of the Dead

movies.original_title: ウルトラマンブレーザー THE MOVIE 大怪獣首都激突
movies.overview: A wave of kaiju emerges from an industrial zone, prompting Capitan Gento and the SKaRD to engage in the relentless battle. Yet despite their efforts, the endless kaiju attack continues. Suspecting a link to Necromass Co., an advanced chemical company that researches kaiju carcasses and owns factories in the industrial zone, SKaRD rushes to the company’s CEO and renowned chemist, Dr. Mabuse.  At Necromass Co.’s research facility, Dr. Mabuse explains the development of the damudoxin, a substance on the brink of achieving immortality. Meanwhile, Alien Damuno, who claims themselves as the “ruler of the universe” appears! Chaos ensues when damudoxin leaks from the destroyed tanks, consuming samples of kaiju carcasses and giving rise to the giant Gongilgan, the Demonic Carcass. Set in Tokyo, the capital of Japan, Ultraman Blazar and SKaRD clash in a showdown against the giant kaiju!
movies.title: Ultraman Blazar The Movie: Tokyo Kaiju Showdown

movies.overview: A doctor and his family receive an unexpected delivery from an old friend at their remote country home - a large wooden crate containing a gun, a female zombie and an instruction sheet telling them not to feed her meat. The family is concerned, of course, but she seems harmless enough. Perhaps she can help clean up outside?
movies.title: Miss ZOMBIE

movies.overview: Experimental work by Isao Yamada (Color, VTR).
movies.title: CHIME’RE

movies.overview: A down-and-out scriptwriter spends his days and nights in the bars of Tokyo. When he is thrown out of a joint because it is closing time, there is always a willing lady to spend the rest of the night with. In the street he has countless semi-philosophical discussions with fellow drinkers, male and female, (shot in black-and-white, as prologue to the different chapters) but in the end it often comes down to one thing: the bottle of whisky that has to be finished. An encounter with a homeless young man with AIDS marks a turning point in the life of the writer.
movies.title: Closing Time

movies.overview: Jam Films is a 2002 suite of 7 shorts produced by Sega/Amuse.
movies.title: Jam Films

movies.original_title: 美弥 るりか　ディナーショー 『Razzle』
movies.overview: Dinner show.
movies.title: Miya Rurika Dinner Show 『Razzle』

movies.original_title: タフ PART I 誕生編
movies.overview: Jiro, a freelancer working at a delivery pizza shop, witnesses the brilliant killing techniques of professional assassin Nejime at a gangster's office where he makes deliveries. Jiro rescues the wounded Nejime and volunteers to become his apprentice. From that day on, Jiro learns the art of killing in a dog eats dog world.
movies.title: Tuff Part I - Origin

movies.original_title: RAILWAYS 49歳で電車の運転士になった男の物語
movies.overview: A heartwarming tale about the turning point in the life of an elite business man in his fifties and a local train that has been running since 1911. Hajime is in line to be the next head of a prominent electronics company. He toils day and night over his work and has no time for his family. But one day, his mother in Shimane falls ill, and his best friend dies in an accident. Grief-stricken, Hajime returns home, where memories of his childhood dream come back to him. He had always wanted to be a train conductor and drive the local "bataden" Ichibata Electric Railway.
movies.title: Railways

movies.overview: A pair of Tokyo policewomen who pack their own brand of "deadly weapons" do some serious undercover work as they take on the toughest cases the department has to offer in this steamy mix of cop action and softcore drama.
movies.title: Police Branch 82: Rebirth

movies.overview: NJPW Windy City Riot 2024 was a professional wrestling pay-per-view event promoted by New Japan Pro Wrestling (NJPW). The event took place at the Wintrust Arena in Chicago, Illinois on April 12, 2024.
movies.title: NJPW Windy City Riot 2024

movies.overview: A drama from director Masaharu Segawa.
movies.title: Topsy-Turvy Journey

movies.overview: A woman and a man meet on an abandoned tochka along the seashore in Hokkaido, Japan.
movies.title: Tochka

movies.original_title: ラブライブ！虹ヶ咲学園スクールアイドル同好会 2nd Live!
movies.overview: Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club 2nd Live! (ラブライブ！虹ヶ咲学園スクールアイドル同好会 2nd Live!) is Nijigasaki High School Idol Club's second solo live concert that took place at Tokyo Garden Theater on the following dates:  September 12, 2020: Brand New Story  September 13, 2020: Back to the TOKIMEKI  The Blu-ray of the concert was released on March 24, 2021.
movies.title: Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club 2nd Live!

movies.original_title: 交渉人 THE MOVIE タイムリミット高度10,000mの頭脳戦
movies.overview: ¥ 260,000,000 is stolen from armored vehicle. The criminals escape into a crowded shopping mall and take over 50 hostages. Reiko Usagi (Ryoko Yonekura) and the SIT members are called in to break the stand-off. When Reiko goes into the shopping mall to negotiate, an explosion suddenly occurs. The hostages panic and run, while the criminals are able to blend into crowd of people and escape. A few weeks later, Reiko is at the Haneda Airport to go on a vacation. She then spots Yusuke Kimoto (Kento Hayashi), a man who was one of the hostages at the shopping mall. Reiko remembers Yusuke's bizarre behavior and her instinct starts kicking in. She decides to follow the man and boards the airplane that Yusuke is taking. Shortly after take-off her instincts prove correct. The airplane is hijacked ...
movies.title: The Negotiator: The Movie

movies.overview: Ryūichi and his small gang of Triad vie for control of the Japanese underworld in a crime-ridden Shinjuku quarter while Detective Jojima tries to bring it down.
movies.tagline: A daring exercise in ultra-violent extremes.
movies.title: Dead or Alive

movies.overview: At dawn, Yuki goes out onto the balcony and indulges in masturbation in a bold pose. Michiko spreads butter on her private parts and writhes in pleasure as her dog licks them. Hiroko, a nurse, is a lecherous woman who goes out to the city after her shift to hunt for men and masturbates without hesitation if a customer at a bar requests it. Emi, a female college student, discovers the joy of masturbation with a vibrator she found in a friend's room. Mari, thinking of her lover who died in a traffic accident, gazes out at the sea and fondles her private parts with her fingers. Saeko, a wealthy madam, has a habit of getting drunk and masturbating in the toilets of bars...
movies.title: ONANIE 24 Hours

movies.overview: Nowadays, abandoned bicycles are a common sight in front of stations in Tokyo. The number of abandoned bicycles is unparalleled in the world, and there are concerns about how to deal with them. The protagonist is a worker who removes such abandoned bicycles. The job involves removing other people's bicycles without asking, which naturally leads to constant trouble during the work. Is it his own fault? Is the world to blame? The man begins to ask himself. The stress of his job causes him to start taking pleasure in riding his bicycle around town at night. But what he sees is nothing but a wild landscape. One night, while riding his bike as usual, the man sees something else...
movies.title: Life Cycles

movies.overview: Kametaro Deba faces difficulty immense difficulty with women, and even after he finally marries, he enjoys a sexless life where his wife is cheats on him. He kills her and dumps the body parts in the mountains, where his wife's ghost curses him and causes him to turn into a monster called "Scissor Penis".
movies.tagline: 本当はエログロいイソップ寓話
movies.title: Scissor Penis

movies.original_title: ゴッドタン キス我慢選手権 THE MOVIE2 サイキック・ラブ
movies.overview: A popular high school student, who is good at sports and studies, must suppress kissing for 24 hours.
movies.title: God Tongue: Kiss Pressure Game The Movie 2 Psychic Love

movies.overview: A group of seemingly ordinary merchants is really a band of assassins for hire. When they discover that all the assassins in Edo are being killed they must act quickly to find the culprit.
movies.tagline: Assassins vs assassins! New samurai action! The inner struggle of underground killers!
movies.title: Sure Death

last_episode_to_air.name: Mortal Combat
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the ruthless Gentosai finally corners Iroha, Shujiro faces Bukotsu in a fierce final showdown. Meanwhile, Okubo closes in on the game's mastermind.

tv_shows.name: Last Samurai Standing
tv_shows.overview: In the early Meiji era, Shujiro, once known as an undefeated samurai, decides to participate in a deadly survival game to save his family and villagers.

tv_shows.name: Nogizaka Under Construction
tv_shows.overview:
Nogizaka46 is making a big leap forward right now!

Their activities range from live performances, varieties, dramas, movies, and models.

In order to give these girls even more momentum, this program will challenge various projects that bring out new aspects and charms of the members!!!

tv_shows.name: Downtown no Gaki no Tsukai ya Arahende!!
tv_shows.original_name: ダウンタウンのガキの使いやあらへんで！
tv_shows.overview: A Japanese variety show hosted by popular Japanese owarai duo, Downtown, with comedian Hōsei Tsukitei (formerly known as Hōsei Yamasaki) and owarai duo Cocorico co-hosting.

seasons.name: Specials
seasons.overview: Downtown no Gaki no Tsukai ya Arahende!! (Dauntaun no Gaki no Tsukai ya Arahende!!?, lit. "Downtown's 'This is no task for kids!!'")

tv_shows.name: Downtown no Gaki no Tsukai ya Arahende!!
tv_shows.original_name: ダウンタウンのガキの使いやあらへんで！
tv_shows.overview: A Japanese variety show hosted by popular Japanese owarai duo, Downtown, with comedian Hōsei Tsukitei (formerly known as Hōsei Yamasaki) and owarai duo Cocorico co-hosting.

seasons.name: Specials
seasons.overview: Downtown no Gaki no Tsukai ya Arahende!! (Dauntaun no Gaki no Tsukai ya Arahende!!?, lit. "Downtown's 'This is no task for kids!!'")

tv_shows.name: Nogizaka Under Construction
tv_shows.overview:
Nogizaka46 is making a big leap forward right now!

Their activities range from live performances, varieties, dramas, movies, and models.

In order to give these girls even more momentum, this program will challenge various projects that bring out new aspects and charms of the members!!!

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: The police make an arrest, but it isn't of Makiko. Anzu and Yuzu pay a visit to the Mitarai house to find out the whole truth.

tv_shows.name: Burn the House Down
tv_shows.overview: After her mother took the blame for a tragic fire 13 years ago, Anzu plots revenge by working as a housekeeper under a pseudonym for her icy stepmother.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: After her mother took the blame for a tragic fire 13 years ago, Anzu plots revenge by working as a housekeeper under a pseudonym for her icy stepmother.

tv_shows.tagline: That woman stole my home and my whole family…

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: The police make an arrest, but it isn't of Makiko. Anzu and Yuzu pay a visit to the Mitarai house to find out the whole truth.

tv_shows.name: Burn the House Down
tv_shows.overview: After her mother took the blame for a tragic fire 13 years ago, Anzu plots revenge by working as a housekeeper under a pseudonym for her icy stepmother.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: After her mother took the blame for a tragic fire 13 years ago, Anzu plots revenge by working as a housekeeper under a pseudonym for her icy stepmother.

tv_shows.tagline: That woman stole my home and my whole family…

last_episode_to_air.name: Judgment: Ring Hunter
last_episode_to_air.overview: Why did Kuon become a Ring Hunter? Before him appeared a man who knew the answer to that mystery: Koyo Iwao. To Kuon, Momiji was a benefactor who looked after him and Hoeru in the No One World when they were children. Koyo, now a Ring Warrior, and Kuon engage in a fierce battle for the ring...! The Gozyugers, who stumbled upon this battle between Kuon and Koyo, are suddenly attacked by Ribbon. Ribbon imprisons not only the Gozyugers and Koyo, but even Kuon himself in a mysterious prison! The Gozyugers and Kuon must now cooperate to escape...!?

tv_shows.name: Super Sentai Series

next_episode_to_air.name: Burning Intensity! I'll Show You the Power of the Rings!
next_episode_to_air.overview: Until now, the Gozyugers have encountered various Universe Warriors and fought over the Sentai Rings. Now, Kazu Sekimoto, the passionate Toei producer who once made a documentary series following the Gozyugers, is making a comeback! Producer Sekimoto will once again follow the Gozyugers closely, uncovering the secrets of the Sentai Rings!?

tv_shows.original_name: スーパー戦隊シリーズ
tv_shows.overview: A group of five (in some cases fewer, or more) people gain special powers (magical or technological), wear colored outfits, and use advanced weapons and martial arts skills to battle powerful beings from other planets and/or dimensions threatening to take over the Earth.

seasons.name: Chikyuu Sentai Fiveman
seasons.overview: Twenty years after their planet was attacked by the brutal Zone Empire, the five Hoshikawa children, who escaped and were raised on Earth, must prepare for a brand-new war. This time, though, they're ready ... having developed the powerful Fiveman technology that will help them defend Earth from the same empire that conquered their home world.

seasons.name: Choujin Sentai Jetman
seasons.overview: The Sky Force sends five highly trained operatives to participate in an experiment which will expose them to Birdonic Waves, resulting in superhuman abilities. But when the Earth Ship is attacked by Vyram, the majority of the Birdonic Waves are sent to Earth and find four unsuspecting civilians. Now, it's up to these four accidental super humans – Raita, Kaori, Ako, and Gai – alongside Ryu, the only original operative to receive Birdonic Waves, to defend their dimension against Vyram.

seasons.name: Kyoryu Sentai Zyuranger
seasons.overview: When the sinister witch Bandora is released from her prison after 170 million years, five warriors from an ancient time arise from their suspended animation to once again defend Earth from Bandora and her evil horde. Armed with enchanted weapons and giant robotic deities known as the Guardian Beasts, it's up to these warriors to defeat Bandora and her monsters before she can exact revenge upon the Earth!

seasons.name: Gosei Sentai Dairanger
seasons.overview: With the Gorma's return, Master Kaku forms the Dairangers, a team of kids with high Ch'i formed to protect Earth in a war of magic.

seasons.name: Ninja Sentai Kakuranger
seasons.overview: It's been a long time since the great war between the Three God Generals and the Youkais, an ancient race of monstrous spirits. Since then, imprisoned in a cave protected by the mystical Seal Door, their leader Daimaou and his Youkai army wait, planning for the day they can finally strike. That day has arrived and it is up to the Kakurangers, along with the Three God Generals, to defeat the Youkais, before Daimaou's villainy destroys Earth!

seasons.name: Choriki Sentai Ohranger
seasons.overview: Empowered by ancient energy, the Ohrangers must battle the Emperor to prevent him from exterminating humanity and establishing machine rule.

seasons.name: Gekisou Sentai Carranger
seasons.overview: Visited by an alien, five auto garage workers are granted "Carmagic" powers and join the battle against a ruthless gang of interstellar biker thugs.

seasons.name: Denji Sentai Megaranger
seasons.overview: Kenta and his classmates, recruited for their gaming skills, are drawn into a battle against an otherworldly army, which changes their lives forever.

seasons.name: Seijuu Sentai Gingaman
seasons.overview: Three millennia after the Space Pirates Barban’s first invasion, new Gingamen are chosen to protect the Earth—unless the Barban disrupt the ceremony!

seasons.name: Kyukyu Sentai GoGoFive
seasons.overview: The Grand Witch Grandiene has been waiting for the day of resurrection, the day when the planets are in alignment so that her children can descend to the Earth and turn it into a realm of darkness! Ten years prior, Professor Tatsumi of the Tatsumi Disaster Prevention Institute had predicted this event, but nobody believed him. He secretly developed and constructed the Rescue System. Now, Professor Tatsumi appears again to give the means to save the world ... and the heroic Kyukyu Sentai GoGoFive springs into action!

seasons.name: Mirai Sentai Timeranger
seasons.overview: In the 30th century, four Time Protection Dept. cadets team up to preserve history and stop those who time travel illegally and threaten the timeline.

seasons.name: Hyakujuu Sentai Gaoranger
seasons.overview: Long ago, a great, destructive war between humans the Orgs was ended; the people of Earth were believed to be the victors. But now, 1,000 years later, the Orgs have returned. And five new warriors have been selected by the Power Animals to claim the responsibility of protecting humanity once again, by becoming the Hyakujuu Sentai, Gaoranger!

seasons.name: Ninpuu Sentai Hurricaneger
seasons.overview: After tragedy strikes on graduation day at the Ninja Academy, three pupils waste no time taking on the clan of evil space warriors responsible.

seasons.name: Bakuryu Sentai Abaranger
seasons.overview: The meteorite believed to have once killed off the dinosaurs actually rattled the Earth into two parallel universes — Another Earth and Dino Earth, where dinosaurs continued to thrive. Now they have evolved into the Saurians, a race of humanoid dinosaurs, and the Bakuryū , a race of mechanized dinosaurs. But the wall between our universes has been breached. The Evolians that have been at war with the Saurians and Bakuryuū have invaded, and it's up to the Abarangers to protect the world!

seasons.name: Tokusou Sentai Dekaranger
seasons.overview: Welcome to Megalopolis! Once a peaceful Earth city, it's now a haven for criminals aided by the nefarious Alienizer arms dealer, Agent Abrella. Now, it's up to Ban Akaza and the Special Police Dekarangers to protect the Earth from the invading Alienizers and finally bring peace and justice back to the planet.

seasons.name: Kaitou Sentai Lupinranger VS Keisatsu Sentai Patranger

last_episode_to_air.name: Don’t Show This at School! Unstoppable Jealousy
last_episode_to_air.overview: Watarai’s bold closeness leaves Hioki flustered, but jealousy soon pushes Watarai to take an even bolder step.

tv_shows.name: School Trip: Joined A Group I'm Not Close To
tv_shows.original_name: 修学旅行で仲良くないグループに入りました
tv_shows.overview: An awkward teen joins a group of popular classmates on a school trip, sparking an unexpected romance with the most popular and charming boy in school.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: When a shy teen is pulled into the inner circle of the school’s hottest boys, the leader's obsessive crush turns a dream trip into dangerous romance.
